metadata.name: @itentialopensource/f5-big-iq-rest
metadata.description: Project with workflows for F5 BIG-IQ using REST protocol for managing BIG-IP devices.
metadata.author: Itential

Run Script on BIG-IP - F5 - BIG-IQ

2af6.name: ViewData
2af6.description: Displays a message and runtime data to an operator. This can be used to request a decision, or used for acknowledgement only.

incoming.message:
Re-Activation of license is required before proceeding with rest of this job. 

Use the link(s) below to navigate to page to re-activate device license. Note this should only be run during a maintenance window as re-activating the license will cause a reboot of the device.

Upon completing re-activation of license, select "Continue Job". If error occurred re-activating license, select "End Job".









.

935a.summary: Create iHealth Upload Task Post Upgrade
935a.description: Create iHealth upload task post upgrade

c430.description: Create BIG-IP software upgrade inputs for machine Id search, re-activation links, and iHealth task

b992.name: transformation
b992.description: Confirm enough disk space is available on BIG-IP device

incoming.header: Not Enough Disk Space for Upgrade
incoming.message:
The amount of disk space found on BIG-IP device is not enough for a software upgrade. See amount of disk space found below. If possible to reformat disk for more space, do so and select "Check Disk" to check disk space again. If not possible, select "End Job" to end job.









.

data.name: Create iHealth Upload Task - F5 - BIG-IQ
data.description: Create iHealth upload task

8388.name: reattempt
8388.summary: Delay and Query iHealth Task Status
8388.description: Delay and query iHealth task status

2c87.name: transformation
2c87.description: Creates input for iHealth upload task in BIG-IQ

ff7c.name: ViewData
ff7c.description: Show failure result and option for next step

incoming.header: Failed to Create iHealth Upload Task
incoming.message:
Failed to create the iHealth upload task, see error response. Select "Retry Task" to retry uploading iHealth Task or select "End Job" to end this job.








.

15b4.name: ViewData
15b4.description: Show failure result and option for next step

incoming.message:
The number of reattempts to query iHealth task status exceeded expected number of reattempts. Select "Query Task" to query again or select "End Job" to end the job.

See query task response below.








.

9e84.name: ViewData
9e84.description: Show failure result and options for next steps

incoming.header: Failed to Create iHealth Upload Task
incoming.message:
Failed to create the iHealth upload task, see error response. Select "Retry" to retry call to create iHealth upload task or select "End Job" to end this job.








.

5c4a.name: ViewData
5c4a.description: Show failure result and options for next steps

incoming.header: Failed to Get iHealth Upload Task Status
incoming.message:
Failed to get the iHealth upload task status, see error response below. Select "Retry" to retry call to get iHealth upload task status or select "End Job" to end this job.








.

data.name: Run BIG-IP Upgrade - F5 - BIG-IQ
data.description: Discover BIG-IP device over BIG-IQ

8388.name: reattempt
8388.summary: Delay and Query Software Upgrade Task Status
8388.description: Delay and query device backup task status

62ed.name: evaluation
62ed.summary: Check If Software Upgrade Task Failed

ff7c.name: ViewData
ff7c.description: Show failure result and option for next step

incoming.message:
Failed software upgrade, see error response below. Select "Retry Upgrade" to retry software upgrade or select "End Job" to end the job and have device rollback performed.














.

c704.name: evaluation
c704.summary: Check If Device Discovery Task Finished

15b4.name: ViewData
15b4.description: Show failure result and option for next step

incoming.message:
The number of reattempts to query software upgrade task status exceeded expected number of reattempts. Select "Query Task" to query again or select "End Job" to end the job and have device rollback performed.














.

1c3e.name: transformation
1c3e.description: Create input for device backup over BIG-IQ

f580.name: ViewData
f580.description: Show error result and options for next steps

incoming.message:
Failed to perform software upgrade on the device, see error response below. Select "Retry" to retry call to attempt software upgrade again or select "End Job" to end the job and have device rollback performed.














.

6d6e.name: ViewData
6d6e.description: Show error result and options for next steps

incoming.header: Getting Software Upgrade Task Status Failed
incoming.message:
Failed to get task status of software upgrade. See error response below. Select "Retry" to retry call to get task status of software upgrade or select "End Job" to end the job and have device rollback performed.














.

readme:
# F5 - BIG-IQ - REST ## Overview Project with workflows for F5 BIG-IQ using REST protocol for managing BIG-IP devices. Upgrade BIG-IP Device - F5 - BIG-IQ ## External Dependencies
Name OS Version API Version
F5 BIG-IQ 8.3
## Adapters
Name Version
adapter-f5_bigiq ^0.3.4
